topics.body:
So guys, Daredevil. I have one VERY minor gripe about it.
[spoiler]His finall outfit is kind of goofy. And yes I get that Daredevil is a blind man who regularly takes down ninjas and shit and he's kind of a goofy character to begin with. But I think because I saw his first outfit so much I got more attached to it. And one of the things I REALLY liked was that his old black mask covered his eyes completely. Because that makes sense. Why would a blind man need eye holes in his costume? If they had just kept the eye covering in his new mask I wouldn't complain as much.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

Just type down the transforming animated in the Anime, Thinking about how that'd work in Toy wise is pretty hard!

Although a counterpoint for something I REALLY liked about Daredevil.
[spoiler]I appreciate that they kept Matt's Catholicism intact. His faith is one of the many reasons Daredevil doesn't want to kill. Because murder is a cardinal sin. And those Catholics take their sins very seriously.[/spoiler]
